attributes.action: To stop people owning more than 2 properties for the purpose of letting them out
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the cost of houses ever rising way way above our own earnings how on earth is the average, decent hard working person supposed to get on the property lader?

I am a hardworking 25 year old who has worked since the age of 12 and in order to live in the borough I work in I would need to get a mortgage for at least 9 times my wages. This is ludicrous and down right unfair. 

I would like to see the governemt limit the amount of properties one person can own with the intention of renting them out to make money to 2 properties as it is the people who already have money and property who are cashing in on the current, unacceptable situation.
